alert.note: Alert for Concho; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 1:41AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tom Green and Concho Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wall, moving southeast at 25 mph. This storm produced 50 mph winds across San Angelo. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vancourt around 200 AM CDT. Eden around 245 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, Vick, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 765, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929, Live Oak and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
